scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd ./back && yarn install && cd ../lk-ui && yarn install && cd ../front-ui && yarn install
scripts.dev: concurrently -p '[{name}]' -c 'bgGreen,bgCyan,bgMagenta' -n 'back,lk-ui,front-ui' 'cd ./back && yarn start:dev' 'cd ./lk-ui && yarn dev' 'cd ./front-ui && yarn dev'
